casebody.data:
ADAMS CREEK ASSOCIATES
v.
DAVIS, et al. 3A08-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 10, 2018 L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Smithfield, Law Lamar Armstrong, III, Attorneys at Law, for Adams Creek Associates. James E. Hairston, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Davis, Melvin, et al. William G. Simpson, Jr., Chapel Hill, C. Frank Goldsmith, Jr., Marion, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of May 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of May 2018."
